summary: This bill, H.R. 4013, amends United States Code Title 4 to allow the U.S. flag to be flown at half-staff upon the death of the Mayor of the District of Columbia. It modifies existing provisions regarding flag protocol to include the Mayor of D.C. alongside existing mentions of government officials and governors of states, territories, and possessions. The bill's aim is to extend the honor of half-staff flag display to recognize the Mayor's passing.
